revision.text:
{{doomwiki}}The '''PLAYPAL''' lump is a collection of game [[palette]]s used for various purposes. In ZDoom, only the first is read, so if you are using a custom palette there is no need to have more than one. The format is a raw 256-color palette taking 768 bytes.
The remainder were used for various [[palette flash]] tints such as the red of taking damage, the white of picking up items, and the green of the radiation suit. ZDoom calculates all these in-game. [[Category:Graphics lumps]]
